external_references.source_name: Objective See Green Lambert for OSX Oct 2021
external_references.description: Sandvik, Runa. (2021, October 1). Made In America: Green Lambert for OS X. Retrieved March 21, 2022.
Sandvik, Runa. (2021, October 18). Green Lambert and ATT&CK. Retrieved March 21, 2022.

objects.description: [Green Lambert](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0690) can create a [Launch Agent](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1543/001) with the `RunAtLoad` key-value pair set to true, ensuring the `com.apple.GrowlHelper.plist` file runs every time a user logs in.(Citation: Objective See Green Lambert for OSX Oct 2021)(Citation: Glitch-Cat Green Lambert ATTCK Oct 2021)
